properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 2:58PM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of
2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Antrim, Otsego and Charlevoix Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced
visibilities from falling and blowing snow.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief lull in the snowfall is expected
early this evening before lake effect snowfall increases in
intensity later this evening.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
